name: Nexus (itch) (Federico Mele-Tekkenfede)
description:
The game is under development and playtesting, feel free to help us with feedback and advice.

------------------------------------------------------------------------ 

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Play this Fast Paced Roguelike Fps game inspired by Ghostrunner and Tron. Discover a Dynamic Ability and Parkour system and test yourself with 4 different difficulties in lots of differents levels.

How to play:

  1. Play the tutorial (or don't do it, like everyone)
  2. Choose your difficulty
  3. Jump everywhere with the parkour system
  4. Level Up
    • Use different Perks each time
  5. And set a new high score if you can

Cheat - Not Raccomended/Just for Fun

F12 = Unlock All Perks -Can Cause Crash

1-2-3 = Set Level

Repeat 1 = Reset Level And High Score

For my other works : Linktree
